name: Assassin's Creed: Unity - Dead Kings
description:
Dead Kings is a single-player downloadable content addition for Assassin's Creed: Unity. It was released in the US on 13 January 2015 on Xbox One, PlayStation 4, and PC, and on 14 January 2015 in Europe, Asia and Middle East for PlayStation 4.

Set after the events of the main game, it follows Arno Dorian as he battles a group of raiders sacking the tombs of French kings in Saint-Denis. The content is available for free for all players, with Season Pass holders being compensated with a free Ubisoft game.
